sections.heading: company; articles of incorporation; amendment; procedure; exception
sections.text: Except as otherwise provided in the Insurers Demutualization Act, any domestic insurance company, association, or society, hereinafter called company, may amend its articles of incorporation from time to time without limitation so l

sections.heading: constitutional and applies only to companies existing at the time the statute was adopted
sections.text: State ex rel. Martin v. Howard, 96 Neb. 278, 147 N.W. 689 (1914).
